message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,250? This is a very fair offer for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $11,000 for the product?
